summary: Completed full e2e testing of Brokers feature - all backend API endpoints and frontend CRUD operations verified successfully

issues: Console warning: HTML hydration error - <span> cannot be child of <tbody> and <tr> cannot be child of <span>. This appears in Dashboard.jsx around line 428-430 where deals are mapped inside a table. Not critical but should be fixed for cleaner console output.

action_items: MINOR: Fix Dashboard.jsx hydration warning - remove wrapper span around table row mapping (lines ~428-430)
seed_data_creation: TEST_UI_Broker and TEST_Broker created during testing, cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Brokers feature fully tested and working. Backend API tests in /app/backend/tests/test_brokers.py can be reused. Mike Johnson broker exists in DB from previous curl test by main agent.

backend_api: GET /api/brokers - List all brokers with optional status/search filters
frontend_ui: Brokers navigation link in sidebar under Customers section
Brokers page loads with 4 stats cards (Total, Active, Total Sales, Avg Commission)
Tabs work for filtering (All, Active, Inactive, Pending)
Brokers table displays data correctly with action buttons
